bill.summary:
Ensuring Quality Education for Veterans Act
This bill amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to make proprietary institutions of higher education ineligible to receive educational assistance from Department of Defense or Veterans Affairs programs.
